alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 14 at 10:10AM PST until January 15 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Isolated gusts to 65 mph. * WHERE...Ventura County Mountains and Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty winds. This includes Highway 33 in Ventura County as well as Interstate 5 and Highway 14 in Los Angeles County. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty Santa Ana winds could linger into Sunday and this advisory may need to be extended.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range; Ventura County Mountains
